page.title: 07 POLITICS A1 CONTROVERSEY
page.content: LOCAL POLITICS A local issue which has caused a great deal of anger from the people of this area concerns the plans of the Department of Transport to widen the A1 road in the northern part of the area to allow it to carry a larger volume of traffic.A great number of local people are fiercely opposed to this on the grounds that it will damage the local environment and make life a misery for people who live near the road. Several public enquiries have been hel to consult the general public but these have had to be abandoned in the face of local opposition.Local objectors have deliberately disrupted enquiry meetings so that the plans could not be implemented.For the moment local people appear to have won.
